listitem.para: Whether labeled IPsec loopback should be enabled or not; acceptable values are no (the default) or yes. Note that some Linux kernels disable some XFRM/NETKEY functions required for loopback that can prevent Labeled IPsec from working correctly. Ensure that both /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/disable_xfrm and /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/disable_policy are set to 0.
